divs: sighting detailsstar watching with my girlfriend, and noticed multiple flashing objects in sky. some emitted red, white, and green lights, others faded and we took notice to other lights near those flashing. these looked like triangle flashing light formations. we also saw a very close, fluid moving red object . this could not have been a plane as assumed at first, because the object stopped frequently, changed paths, and ascended\descended very fluidly. we actually saw 3 planes while sitting out there. they blinked white lights and stayed on a straight path. we were sitting near a pond for about 45 minutes when my girlfriend made a sudden noise with some cans. immediately, something in the pond proceeded to walk across the water and disappear about 10ft into the pond. i say walk across the water because the wake\waves\disturbance in the water was extremely minimal, and it was odd because we had been in the same spot moving and walking around for approximately 45 minutes before the entity took notice of us. if this were any normal pond animal, it would have left when we first came to the pond due the noise we had made. what was also strange was that my girlfriend witnessed the whole thing, but couldn't recall what the entity looked like. all she noticed was how it was walking on the water seemlessly and appeared small and black. i believe it was a little plantlike alien entity spying on us because we have been investigating the skies for the past 3 weeks.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Springfield
There was one other sighting in Springfield on or around June 22nd 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Springfield, LA - Mult. UFO sightings & close encounter
